title: Infinix Hot 11S (7° Purple, 64 GB)  (4 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Adaptor, USB Type-C Cable, TPU Case, Protective Screen Guard, SIM Ejector Pin, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Sound Enhancements: Dual Speakers with DTS Surround Sound
product_specification.Display Type: Full HD+ LCD LTPS In-cell Display
product_specification.Other Display Features: 90Hz Refresh Rate, 180Hz Sampling Rate, 20.5:9 Aspect Ratio, 500 NITS Brightness, 90.53% Screen-to-Body Ratio, Eye Care Mode, NEG Dinorex T2X-1 Glass Protection
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, 3G WCDMA: B1/B5/B8, 4G LTE: B1/B3/B5/B8/B38/B40/B41
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: AI Triple Rear Camera Setup: 50MP (f/1.6) + 2MP + AI Lens, Quad LED Flash, Modes: Super Night, Custom Portrait, AI HDR, AI 3D Beauty, Panorama, Document, AR Shots, Slo-mo Video, Time Lapse, Short Video, 2K Video Recording with Bokeh
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 8MP AI Front Camera (f/2.0) Dual LED Flash, Modes: Super Night, AI Portrait, AI 3D Face Beauty, WideSelfie, AR Shots, Time Lapse, 2K Video Recording with Bokeh
product_specification.Flash: Rear - Quad LED Flash | Front - Dual LED Flash
product_specification.Sensors: Fingerprint Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor, G-Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Gyroscope, E-Compass
product_specification.Other Features: DAR-LINK Game Boost Technology, Power Marathon Tech, Video Assistant, Ultra Touch, Thunderback, Xhide, Theft Alert, Peek Proof, Kids Mode, Xclone, Photo Compressor, 360 Flashlight, Social Turbo, Wi-Fi Share, Smart Gestures, Digital Wellbeing, Dark Theme, Eye Care, Multi-Window, Bike Mode, Game Mode, Smart Panel, AI Gallery
product_specification.Audio Formats: AAC, AAC+, AAC+ Enhanced, OGG Vorbis, WAV, MP3, Midi
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset and 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.17.22 cm (6.78) FHD+ High Resolution Dis: The Infinix Hot 11S features a 17.22 cm (6.78) FHD+ High-resolution Punch Hole display that features a 20.5:9 aspect ratio for a disruption-free viewing experience. To enhance the aesthetics and visual experience, it has a 90.5% screen-to-body ratio. Also, the 500 NITS brightness offers crystal-clear images, whereas the NEG Dinorex T2X-1 glass protection ensures durability.
product_description.90 Hz Smooth Display: The refresh rate of 90 Hz offers a smooth interaction between the screen and your touch. Furthermore, the 180 Hz touch sampling rate ensures fast screen response time. So, for gamers, this smartphone can be quite exciting.
product_description.Helio G88 Octa-core Processor: Powered by an Helio G88 Octa-core processor along with 12nm FinFET, 2.0 GHz CPU frequency, this smartphone offers a smooth performance. For an improved gaming experience, it has the Mediatek Hyper Engine 2.0 Game Boost Technology as well as the DAR-LINK Game Boost Technology. Thus, gaming on this smartphone is screen tearing/stuttering free with high-quality colour reproduction, and no heating. It also has a high-responsive touch panel for high-speed gaming and 3-in-1 card slots to expand the memory capacity up to 256 GB.
product_description.50 MP Wide Aperture Camera: This Infinix smartphone features a 50MP Wide Aperture AI Triple rear Camera having a 50 MP Primary lens (f1.6 wide aperture), a 2 MP Depth sensor, and an AI lens. Also, it has a Quad-LED Flash. Thus, you can click stunning images, capture super slow motion and time-lapse videos using this smartphone. This smartphone camera also has Bokeh Mode, Super Night Mode, Document Mode, Short Video, and more. You can also shoot 2K high-res videos using this phone.
product_description.8 MP selfie with Dual LED Flash: The 8 MP in-display selfie camera comes with an f/2.0 aperture and a dedicated Dual LED flash to let you click high-quality selfies. It also has AI portrait, WideSelfie, Super Night Mode, and 3D Face Beauty Mode to enhance the quality of your selfies. You can also capture 2K high-res videos using this selfie camera.
product_description.18W Fast Charger with Type C: The 5000 mAh battery of this smartphone features a Power Marathon Tech to boost the battery backup by about 25%. As a result, this battery offers up to 27 hours of video playback time, up to 182 hours of music playback time on headsets, 52 hours of 4G talktime, 17 hours of web surfing time, and 64 days of standby time with a single full charge. With this smartphone, you also get an 18W Fast charger and a Type C cable.
product_description.Dual Speakers with DTS: The cinematic Dual Speakers and the DTS Surround Sound technology offer an immersive aural experience and helps you enjoy your favourite music to the most.
product_description.Design: The wave flow pattern design on its back, a circular camera module lens, and a sleek 8.82 mm body make it a stylish smartphone.
product_description.Fingerprint and Face Unlock: The multi-functional fingerprint sensor lets you unlock this smartphone, dismiss an alarm, and accept calls with a tap of a finger. You can sync your favourite apps with different fingers to jumpstart them when you want. This smartphone also comes with a face unlock function.
product_description.XOS 7.6 on Android 11: The XOS 7.6 on Android 11 comes with secure and fast features, such as Ultra touch, Secure Card, Thunderback, Xclone, Theft Alert, Xhide, Video Assistant, Kids Mode, Wi-Fi share, Smart Panel, Game Zone, Photo Compressor, Smart Gestures, Peek Proof, 360 Flashlight, Social Turbo, and much more.

Review after 10 days..
Display is awesome, 90 hz actually works. Viewing angles are also good and there is no colour shift.
Camera is good, tries to capture every minute detail even in low light because of wide aperture.
Performance is very fast, G88 works too good in daily tasks.
Ram management is not great but it is ok for overall perspective.
Battery takes about 2 hrs to charge from 20-100% and lasts 1 day easily and 1.25 days when u turn on power marathon. Warms little bit but no overheating issue.
There is no any lag and bugs in UI, but u have to spend some time to uninstall and disable some bloatwares to avoid ads.
Sound is great, crisp and clear. Strereo effect is there but not that much balanced like high end phones. Loud enough like mini bt speaker.
Overall If u are looking VFM phone in this price range, u should go for it...
